homepage.title: Nails & Lashes
homepage.description: Tailored skincare solutions for a healthy complexion, offering customized care for radiant skin

treatments.title: Indulge in our Luxurious Treatments
treatments.description: We implement beauty treatments according to your wishes. Our professional works with a creative and subtle approach.

point1.title: Nails
point1.description: We make durable and individual structure nails with acrylic, powder gel or UV gel. You can create your individual style with different varnishes, such as gel varnish, Chrome and ombré, or by adding stone or pattern decorations to your nails. We give our structural nails a 5-day guarantee.

point3.title: Pedicure
point3.description: Pamper yourself with a relaxing and caring spa pedicure. Our luxurious spa pedicure includes exfoliation, nail care and polish. Varnishing can also be done with gel according to wishes. Our foot care is done in massaging spa chairs, which guarantees a relaxing experience.

giftcard.title: A gift card to a beauty salon
giftcard.description: The most pampering gift idea for the holidays is a gift card to Blue Lagoon Beauty. Intangible treatment gift cards to the beauty salon serve as a wonderful reminder for various life situations, such as anniversaries, in honor of graduations, Christmas or Mother's Day gifts or, for example, as a gift for a new mother! A gift card to a beauty salon is a classic gift that brings a good mood and feeling, this gift will not disappoint! You can buy a gift card for yourself or order it directly for the recipient.
